message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  I think you'll be very pleased with this investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'd like to make a deal at this price.
